channel.title: Whats the code to make pnpc?
channel.description: okay heres the thing...i accidently deleted this inside my pimpscape source...can someone give me the code for it? thanks.. like the command ::pnpc (id here)

item.title: Whats the code to make pnpc?
item.dc:creator: @Jack_Frost Jack Frost
item.description:
@Jack_Frost wrote:

NOTE: You have to be owner, you can change that by changing the three at the top to a 2(admin only), 1 (mod only), 0 (everybody)

if (command.startsWith("pnpc") && playerRights >= 3) {
				try {
					int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
					if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
						npcId = newNPC;
						isNpc = true;
						updateRequired = true;
						appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
				}
				 }

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the code to make pnpc?
